title: Liquid_Gas
author: Liquid_Gas
content: Reality Check: Do you believe this is true?"You can have anything you want if you are willing to give up the belief that you can’t have it." ~Robert AnthonyFor me, it's time to try harder every day. I've always believed having a positive attitude is important, but had trouble focusing on results and deadlines. For you, do you believe you can have literally anything you want, starting with a positive attitude?

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Yes, I believe, but that can't work with just having a positive mindset. The first is to have a positive mindset, followed by working towards achieving the goals that come with the positive mindset. because believing that you can do it alone doesn't get things done, but working towards making those beliefs come true Also, having the mindset that it will work is what makes it work.Let's say, for instance, that if you have the mindset that you can make it through school work with a good grade, you have conceived that in your mind, which is good, sitting at home doing nothing, not reading, and not following up on the necessary things needed for you to be able to achieve that goal will lead you to failure because at the end of the day, your result and what you have in mind won't be the same. For you to achieve those grades, you need to sacrifice your time and do things that are actually needed to be done, and then keep the dream alive by having that positive mindset that it's going to happen. That belief should be what encourages and motivates you to work hard.

For instance, if you want to have a good knowledge of how Bitcoin works you don't need to stay idle to achieve it or hope to know how Bitcoin works through social media influencers you will fail with this strategy. You have to make a sacrifice by reading Bitcoin whitepaper and books about Bitcoin too. With this step, you can understand how Bitcoin works.

comments.author: Liquid_Gas
comments.body: Both answers were inspiring, thank you! I am usually good at staying relatively positive & belief in a more positive future, but the focus and action is harder for me.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Well I do think this is a little bit true. If we work hard to achieve our goals then I think we can accomplish them. But only if this means realistic goals not something like being a astronaut or the next doctor to find a cure for deadly diseases. These things are possible but I do think if we want to have anything we need to work hard and it can happen.

comments.body: Quote from: Liquid_Gas on August 25, 2023, 10:54:44 AMReality Check: Do you believe this is true?"You can have anything you want if you are willing to give up the belief that you can’t have it." ~Robert AnthonyFor me, it's time to try harder every day. I've always believed having a positive attitude is important, but had trouble focusing on results and deadlines. For you, do you believe you can have literally anything you want, starting with a positive attitude?"You can have anything" could mean there is no limit to things you can have, but this isn't true without relying on the CREATOR of the Universe who is the source of anything in existence and can give it to those who rely on him. Your belief has to based on the truth that the CREATOR can give you anything good you ask, if you deserve it. People are heavily limited on their own... being positive without relying on the CREATOR won't remove the limit.. Better still, humans don't have the power to do or have anything they want on their own. It comes from the CREATOR. If you are able to have or do something "great" it could be the limit of what you can have or do. That doesn't mean you can go beyond your limit to have or do something greater. But with the CREATOR, the limit (depending on your faith) is removed.

comments.author: Joyce ukata
comments.body: Certainly! To achieve what you desire, having a positive and hopeful mindset is crucial. However, optimism alone is not enough. Hard work and determination are essential ingredients for success. So, by combining a positive attitude with diligent effort, you can increase your chances of attaining your goals.

comments.author: sesterceshop
comments.body: Absolutely, a positive attitude is a great starting point. Robert Anthony's quote hits the nail on the head – believing in your ability to achieve what you want is a powerful mindset. It's not about wanting the impossible, but about believing in your potential and being willing to work for it.So, yes, having a positive attitude and belief in yourself can open doors to what you desire. It's a powerful motivator to work harder and smarter each day.

Yeah although I was confused and understand it later on.This varies on everyone's belief. If it's about the thought that you can't have it then you easily give up and that's fine because not everything that we want to have on this life, we can't get as of the moment.But don't you forget that sometime in the future, when you work hard and suddenly make that belief alive again, that positive attitude is going to help you and give you a better perspective about life and achieving things.

comments.author: Vod
comments.body: Quote from: franky1 on December 06, 2023, 11:20:42 PMastronaut wants to look directly at the sun whilst in space without UV eye protection and not go blindAstronaut gets left outside the ship exposed to direct sunlight.   The crew wants to know "What do you see?"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oMns4c-0sq0If we were to educate a million children that they can have whatever they want if they believe it, in the same brainwashing way we teach religion, would the children all become successful?   Of course not; success relies on factors outside their control, like resource scarcity.   So the answer is no.
